00039 void Wizard::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath, int Scene){
00040     QPixmap pixmap;
00041 
00042     switch (Scene){
00043         case 0:
00044             // Prefix creation
00045             if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/prefixc.png").arg(themePath))){
00046                 pixmap.load(":data/prefixc.png");
00047             }
00048 
00049             lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00050 
00051 
00052             cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00053             cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00054             cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00055             cmdGetWineDllPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00056 
00057             cmdGetPrefixPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00058             cmdGetMountPoint->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00059 
00060         break;
00061         case 1:
00062             // First startup
00063             if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00064                 pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00065             }
00066 
00067             lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00068 
00069             cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00070             cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00071             cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00072             cmdGetWineDllPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00073 
00074             cmdGetTarBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00075             cmdGetMountBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00076             cmdGetUmountBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00077             cmdGetSudoBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00078             cmdGetGuiSudoBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00079             cmdGetNiceBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00080             cmdGetReniceBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00081             cmdGetShBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00082 
00083             cmdGetConsoleBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00084             cmdGetWrestoolBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00085             cmdGetIcotoolBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00086 
00087                 #ifdef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00088                     cmdGetWrestoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00089                     cmdGetIcotoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00090                     txtWrestoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00091                     txtIcotoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00092                 #endif
00093 
00094         break;
00095         case 2:
00096             // Fake drive
00097             if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00098                 pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00099             }
00100             lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00101         break;
00102         case 3:
00103             // Fake drive
00104             if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00105                 pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00106             }
00107             lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00108         break;
00109     }
00110     return;
00111 }

00113 
00114 QIcon Wizard::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00115     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00116     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00117 
00118     QIcon icon;
00119 
00120     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00121         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00122         if (icon.isNull()){
00123             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00124         }
00125     } else {
00126         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00127     }
00128 
00129     return icon;
00130 }

00134 Wizard::Wizard(int WizardType, QString var1, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00135 {
00136     /*
00137         Note: var1, var2 is optional data, used for different scene actions ;)
00138     */
00139 
00140     setupUi(this);
00141 
00142     widgetCreatePrefix0->setVisible(FALSE);
00143 
00144     Scena=WizardType;
00145     Page=1;
00146     QString console_w;
00147 
00148 
00149     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00150 
00151     settings.beginGroup("app");
00152         loadThemeIcons(settings.value("theme").toString(), Scena);
00153     settings.endGroup();
00154 
00155     switch (Scena){
00156         case 0:
00157             TotalPage=5;
00158 
00159             setWindowTitle(tr("New prefix creation wizard"));
00160             lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Prefix creation wizard</b>"));
00161             lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00162 
00163             connect (cbCreafeFake, SIGNAL(stateChanged (int)), this, SLOT(changeBoxState(int)));
00164 
00165             cmdGetPrefixPath->installEventFilter(this);
00166             cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00167             cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00168             cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00169             cmdGetWineDllPath->installEventFilter(this);
00170             cmdGetMountPoint->installEventFilter(this);
00171 
00172             getprocDevices();
00173         break;
00174         case 1:
00175             TotalPage=7;
00176 
00177             setWindowTitle(tr("First startup wizard"));
00178             lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>First startup wizard</b>"));
00179             lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00180 
00181             cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00182             cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00183             cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00184             cmdGetWineDllPath->installEventFilter(this);
00185 
00186             cmdGetTarBin->installEventFilter(this);
00187             cmdGetMountBin->installEventFilter(this);
00188             cmdGetUmountBin->installEventFilter(this);
00189             cmdGetSudoBin->installEventFilter(this);
00190             cmdGetGuiSudoBin->installEventFilter(this);
00191             cmdGetNiceBin->installEventFilter(this);
00192             cmdGetReniceBin->installEventFilter(this);
00193             cmdGetShBin->installEventFilter(this);
00194 
00195             cmdGetConsoleBin->installEventFilter(this);
00196             cmdGetWrestoolBin->installEventFilter(this);
00197             cmdGetIcotoolBin->installEventFilter(this);
00198                 core = new CoreMethods ();
00199                 txtWineBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("wine"));
00200                 txtWineServerBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("wineserver"));
00201                 txtWineLoaderBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("wine"));
00202 
00203                 if (QDir("/usr/lib/wine").exists())
00204                     txtWineDllPath->setText("/usr/lib/wine");
00205 
00206                 if (QDir("/local/usr/lib/wine").exists())
00207                     txtWineDllPath->setText("/local/usr/lib/wine");
00208 
00209                 if (QDir("/usr/local/lib/wine").exists())
00210                     txtWineDllPath->setText("/usr/local/lib/wine");
00211 
00212                 txtTarBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("tar"));
00213                 txtMountBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("mount"));
00214                 txtUmountBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("umount"));
00215                 txtSudoBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("sudo"));
00216 
00217                 txtGuiSudoBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("zkdesu"));
00218                    if (txtGuiSudoBin->text().isEmpty()){
00219                     txtGuiSudoBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("gksu"));
00220                    } else {
00221                     if (txtGuiSudoBin->text().isEmpty()){
00222                        txtGuiSudoBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("sudo"));
00223                     }
00224                    }
00225 
00226                 txtNiceBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("nice"));
00227                 txtReniceBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("renice"));
00228                 txtShBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("sh"));
00229 
00230                         console_w = core->getWhichOut("konsole");
00231                             if (!console_w.isEmpty()){
00232                                     txtConsoleBin->setText(console_w);
00233                                     txtConsoleArgs->setText("--noclose -e");
00234                             } else {
00235                                     console_w = core->getWhichOut("xterm");
00236                                     if (!console_w.isEmpty()){
00237                                             txtConsoleBin->setText(console_w);
00238                                             txtConsoleArgs->setText("-e");
00239                                     }
00240                             }
00241 
00242                      #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00243                       txtWrestoolBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("wrestool"));
00244                 txtIcotoolBin->setText(core->getWhichOut("icotool"));
00245                      #endif
00246                 delete core;
00247 
00248         break;
00249         case 2:
00250             TotalPage=6;
00251             this->var1=var1;
00252             setWindowTitle(tr("Fake drive creation wizard"));
00253             lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Fake drive creation wizard</b>"));
00254             lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00255             lblWizardInfo->setText(Wizard::tr("<p>Welcome to fake drive creation wizard.</p><p>This wizard helps you to make all necessary steps for successful fake drive creation.</p><p>Please, press the <b>Next</b> button to go to the next wizard's page. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>"));
00256         break;
00257         case 3:
00258             TotalPage=6;
00259             this->var1=var1;
00260             setWindowTitle(tr("Fake drive update wizard"));
00261             lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Fake drive update wizard</b>"));
00262             lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00263             lblWizardInfo->setText(Wizard::tr("<p>Welcome to fake drive update wizard.</p><p>This wizard helps you to make all necessary steps for successful fake drive creation.</p><p>Please, press the <b>Next</b> button to go to the next wizard's page. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>"));
00264             Scena=2;
00265         break;
00266     }
00267 
00268     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject ()));
00269     connect(cmdNext, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(nextWizardPage()));
00270     connect(cmdBack, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(previosWizardPage()));
00271 
00272     connect(comboProxyType, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(QString)), this, SLOT(comboProxyType_indexChanged(QString)));
00273 
00274     widgetCreatePrefix0->setVisible(FALSE);
00275     widgetCreatePrefix1->setVisible(FALSE);
00276     widgetCreatePrefix2->setVisible(FALSE);
00277 
00278     widgetCreateFakeDrive0->setVisible(FALSE);
00279     widgetCreateFakeDrive1->setVisible(FALSE);
00280     widgetCreateFakeDrive2->setVisible(FALSE);
00281     widgetCreateFakeDrive3->setVisible(FALSE);
00282 
00283     widgetFirstStartup0->setVisible(FALSE);
00284     widgetFirstStartup1->setVisible(FALSE);
00285     widgetFirstStartup2->setVisible(FALSE);
00286     widgetFirstStartup3->setVisible(FALSE);
00287 
00288     widgetInfo->setVisible(FALSE);
00289 
00290     updateScena();
00291 
00292     this->installEventFilter(this);
00293 
00294     return;
00295 }

00297 
00298 void Wizard::comboProxyType_indexChanged(QString text){
00299     if (text==tr("No Proxy")){
00300         txtProxyHost->setEnabled(FALSE);
00301         txtProxyPort->setEnabled(FALSE);
00302         txtProxyUser->setEnabled(FALSE);
00303         txtProxyPass->setEnabled(FALSE);
00304     } else {
00305         txtProxyHost->setEnabled(TRUE);
00306         txtProxyPort->setEnabled(TRUE);
00307         txtProxyUser->setEnabled(TRUE);
00308         txtProxyPass->setEnabled(TRUE);
00309     }
00310 
00311     return;
00312 }

00337 
00338 bool Wizard::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event){
00339     /*
00340         User select folder dialog function
00341     */
00342 
00343     if (this->widgetFrame->width()<=100)
00344        return FALSE;
00345 
00346 
00347     if (event->type() == QEvent::Resize){
00348 
00349        this->widgetInfo->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00350 
00351        this->widgetCreateFakeDrive0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00352        this->widgetCreateFakeDrive1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00353        this->widgetCreateFakeDrive2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00354        this->widgetCreateFakeDrive3->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00355 
00356        this->widgetCreatePrefix0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00357        this->widgetCreatePrefix1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00358        this->widgetCreatePrefix2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00359 
00360        this->widgetFirstStartup0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00361        this->widgetFirstStartup1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00362        this->widgetFirstStartup2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00363        this->widgetFirstStartup3->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00364 
00365        return TRUE;
00366     }
00367 
00368     if (obj->objectName()== "Wizard")
00369        return FALSE;
00370 
00371     if (event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress) {
00372 
00373         QString file;
00374 
00375         if (obj->objectName().right(3)=="Bin"){
00376             file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open File"), QDir::homePath(),   "All files (*)");
00377         } else {
00378             file = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Open Directory"), QDir::homePath(),   QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks);
00379         }
00380 
00381         if (!file.isEmpty()){
00382             QString a;
00383 
00384             a.append("txt");
00385             a.append(obj->objectName().right(obj->objectName().length()-6));
00386 
00387             QLineEdit *lineEdit = findChild<QLineEdit *>(a);
00388 
00389             if (lineEdit){
00390                 lineEdit->setText(file);
00391             } else {
00392                 qDebug("Error");
00393             }
00394 
00395 
00396             if (obj==cmdGetWineBin){
00397 
00398                 QString wrkDir;
00399                 QStringList list1 = file.split("/");
00400 
00401                 wrkDir = file.left(file.length() - list1.last().length());
00402                 txtWineServerBin->setText(tr("%1wineserver").arg(wrkDir));
00403                 txtWineLoaderBin->setText(tr("%1wine").arg(wrkDir));
00404 
00405 
00406             }
00407 
00408         }
00409     }
00410     return FALSE;
00411 }
00412 
00413 
00414 bool Wizard::checkEntry(QString fileName, QString info, bool isFile){
00415     /*
00416      *  This function check user entry
00417      */
00418 
00419     if (fileName.isEmpty()){
00420         switch (isFile){
00421             case FALSE:
00422                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify %1 directory.").arg(info));
00423             break;
00424             case TRUE:
00425                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify %1 binary.").arg(info));
00426             break;
00427         }
00428         return FALSE;
00429     } else {
00430         if (!QFile::exists(fileName)){
00431             switch (isFile){
00432                 case FALSE:
00433                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified %1 directory not exists.").arg(info));
00434                     break;
00435                 case TRUE:
00436                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified %1 binary not exists.").arg(info));
00437                     break;
00438             }
00439             return FALSE;
00440         }
00441     }
00442 
00443     return TRUE;
00444 }
00445 
00446 
00447 void Wizard::nextWizardPage(){
00448     /*
00449         Function for processing next\finish button click events
00450     */
00451 
00452     switch(Scena){
00453         case 1:
00454             switch (Page){
00455                 case 3:
00456 
00457                     if (!checkEntry(txtWineBin->text(), "wine"))
00458                         return;
00459 
00460                     if (!checkEntry(txtWineServerBin->text(), "wine server"))
00461                         return;
00462 
00463                     if (!checkEntry(txtWineLoaderBin->text(), "wine loader"))
00464                         return;
00465 
00466                     if (!checkEntry(txtWineDllPath->text(), "wine library", FALSE))
00467                         return;
00468 
00469                 break;
00470                 case 4:
00471 
00472                     if (!checkEntry(txtTarBin->text(), "tar"))
00473                         return;
00474 
00475                     if (!checkEntry(txtMountBin->text(), "mount"))
00476                         return;
00477 
00478                     if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "umount"))
00479                         return;
00480 
00481                     if (!checkEntry(txtSudoBin->text(), "sudo"))
00482                         return;
00483 
00484                     if (!checkEntry(txtGuiSudoBin->text(), "GUI sudo"))
00485                         return;
00486 
00487                     if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "nice"))
00488                         return;
00489 
00490                     if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "renice"))
00491                         return;
00492 
00493                     if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "sh"))
00494                         return;
00495 
00496                 break;
00497                 case 5:
00498 
00499                     if (!checkEntry(txtConsoleBin->text(), "console"))
00500                         return;
00501 
00502                             #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00503                               if (!checkEntry(txtWrestoolBin->text(), "wrestool"))
00504                                 return;
00505 
00506                               if (!checkEntry(txtIcotoolBin->text(), "icotool"))
00507                         return;
00508                             #endif
00509 
00510                 break;
00511                 case 6:
00512                     if (comboProxyType->currentText()!=tr("No Proxy")){
00513                         if (txtProxyHost->text().isEmpty()){
00514                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify proxy host."));
00515                             return;
00516                         }
00517                         if (txtProxyPort->text().isEmpty()){
00518                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify proxy port."));
00519                             return;
00520                         }
00521                     }
00522                 break;
00523                 case 7:
00524 
00525                     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00526 
00527                     settings.beginGroup("wine");
00528                     settings.setValue("WineBin", txtWineBin->text());
00529                     settings.setValue("ServerBin", txtWineServerBin->text());
00530                     settings.setValue("LoaderBin", txtWineLoaderBin->text());
00531                     settings.setValue("WineLibs", txtWineDllPath->text());
00532                     settings.endGroup();
00533 
00534                     settings.beginGroup("system");
00535                     settings.setValue("tar", txtTarBin->text());
00536                     settings.setValue("mount", txtMountBin->text());
00537                     settings.setValue("umount", txtUmountBin->text());
00538                     settings.setValue("sudo", txtSudoBin->text());
00539                     settings.setValue("gui_sudo", txtGuiSudoBin->text());
00540                     settings.setValue("nice", txtNiceBin->text());
00541                     settings.setValue("renice", txtReniceBin->text());
00542                     settings.setValue("sh", txtShBin->text());
00543                     settings.endGroup();
00544                     settings.beginGroup("console");
00545                     settings.setValue("bin", txtConsoleBin->text());
00546                     settings.setValue("args", txtConsoleArgs->text());
00547                     settings.endGroup();
00548                     settings.beginGroup("icotool");
00549                     settings.setValue("wrestool", txtWrestoolBin->text());
00550                     settings.setValue("icotool", txtIcotoolBin->text());
00551                     settings.endGroup();
00552                     settings.beginGroup("network");
00553                     settings.setValue("host", txtProxyHost->text());
00554                     settings.setValue("post", txtProxyPort->text());
00555                     settings.setValue("user", txtProxyUser->text());
00556                     settings.setValue("pass", txtProxyPass->text());
00557                     if (comboProxyType->currentText()==tr("No Proxy")){
00558                         settings.setValue("type", 0);
00559                     } else {
00560                         if (comboProxyType->currentText()=="HTTP"){
00561                             settings.setValue("type", 1);
00562                         } else {
00563                             settings.setValue("type", 2);
00564                         }
00565                     }
00566 
00567                     settings.endGroup();
00568 
00569                     accept();
00570                 break;
00571             }
00572         break;
00573         case 0:
00574             switch (Page){
00575                 case 2:
00576                     if (txtPrefixName->text().isEmpty()){
00577                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Enter prefix name first."));
00578                             return;
00579                     } else {
00580 
00581                         QSqlQuery query(tr("SELECT name FROM prefix WHERE name='%1';").arg(txtPrefixName->text()));
00582 
00583                         if (query.next()){
00584                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry. There is other prefix with same name."));
00585                             return;
00586                         }
00587 
00588                     }
00589                     if (!txtPrefixPath->text().isEmpty()){
00590                         if (!QDir(txtPrefixPath->text()).exists()){
00591                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, prefix path is wrong! Directory not exists."));
00592                             return;
00593                         }
00594                     } else {
00595                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Select prefix directory first."));
00596                             return;
00597                     }
00598                 break;
00599                 case 4:
00600                     if ((txtMountPoint->text().isEmpty()) and (combSourceDevice->currentText()!=tr("<none>"))){
00601                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify mount point directory."));
00602                         return;
00603                     }
00604                     if ((!txtMountPoint->text().isEmpty()) and (combSourceDevice->currentText()==tr("<none>"))){
00605                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify source device."));
00606                         return;
00607                     }
00608                 break;
00609                 case 5:
00610 
00611                     QSqlQuery q;
00612                     q.prepare("INSERT INTO prefix(id, name, path, wine_exec, wine_server, wine_loader, wine_dllpath, cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive) VALUES(NULL, :name, :path, :wine_exec, :wine_server, :wine_loader, :wine_dllpath, :cdrom_mount, :cdrom_drive);");
00613                     q.bindValue(":name", txtPrefixName->text());
00614                     q.bindValue(":path", txtPrefixPath->text());
00615                     //if (cbCreafeFake->checkState()==Qt::Checked){
00616                     //  q.bindValue(":version", cbFakeVersion->currentText());
00617                     //}
00618 
00619                     q.bindValue(":wine_exec", txtWineBin->text());
00620                     q.bindValue(":wine_server", txtWineServerBin->text());
00621                     q.bindValue(":wine_loader", txtWineLoaderBin->text());
00622                     q.bindValue(":wine_dllpath", txtWineDllPath->text());
00623                     if (!txtMountPoint->text().isEmpty()){
00624                         if (txtMountPoint->text().endsWith ("/"))
00625                             txtMountPoint->setText(txtMountPoint->text().mid(0, txtMountPoint->text().length()-1));
00626 
00627                         q.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", txtMountPoint->text());
00628 
00629                         if (combSourceDevice->currentText()!=tr("<none>")){
00630                             q.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", combSourceDevice->currentText());
00631                         } else {
00632                             q.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00633                         }
00634 
00635                     } else {
00636                         q.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", "");
00637                         q.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", "");
00638                     }
00639 
00640                     if (!q.exec()){
00641                         #ifdef DEBUG
00642                             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL error at Wizard::Scene prefix create\nINFO:\n"<<q.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<q.lastError();
00643                         #endif
00644                         return;
00645                     }
00646 
00647 
00648                     if (cbCreafeFake->checkState()==Qt::Checked){
00649                         Wizard *createFakeDriveWizard = new Wizard(2, txtPrefixName->text());
00650                         createFakeDriveWizard->exec();
00651                     }
00652 
00653                     accept() ;
00654                 break;
00655             }
00656         break;
00657         case 2:
00658             switch (Page){
00659                 case 6:
00660 
00661                     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::BusyCursor );

00673                             version = "win2008";
00674                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows Vista")
00675                             version = "vista";
00676                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 2003")
00677                             version = "win2003";
00678                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 2000")
00679                             version = "win2k";
00680                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows ME")
00681                             version = "winme";
00682                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 98")
00683                             version = "win98";
00684                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 95")
00685                             version = "win95";
00686                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows NT 4.0")
00687                             version = "nt40";
00688                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows NT 3.0")
00689                             version = "nt351";
00690                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 3.1")
00691                             version = "win31";
00692                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 3.0")
00693                             version = "win30";
00694                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 2.0")
00695                             version = "win20";
00696

00821                             query.exec();

00841                                 query.exec();
00842                                 query.clear();

00846                                 query.bindValue(":name", tr("system"));
00847                                 query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
00848                                 query.exec();
00849                                 query.first();
00850                                 dir_id=query.value(0).toString();
00851                                 query.clear();
00852

00854                                 query.prepare("INSERT INTO icon(cmdargs, exec, icon_path, desc, dir_id, name, prefix_id) VALUES(:cmdargs, :exec, :icon_path, :desc, :dir_id, :name, :prefix_id);");
00855                                 query.bindValue(":cmdargs", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00856                                 query.bindValue(":exec", "winecfg");
00857                                 query.bindValue(":icon_path", "winecfg");
00858                                 query.bindValue(":desc", tr("Configure the general settings for Wine"));
00859                                 query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
00860                                 query.bindValue(":name", "winecfg");
00861                                 query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
00862                                 query.exec();
00863                                 query.clear();
00864 
00865                                 query.prepare("INSERT INTO icon(cmdargs, exec, icon_path, desc, dir_id, name, prefix_id) VALUES(:cmdargs, :exec, :icon_path, :desc, :dir_id, :name, :prefix_id);");
00866                                 query.bindValue(":cmdargs", "--backend=user cmd");

00941                                 query.clear();

00944                                 query.prepare("INSERT INTO dir(id, name, prefix_id) VALUES(NULL, :name, :prefix_id)");

00946                                 query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
00947                                 query.exec();
00948 
00949                             }
00950                             query.clear();
00951 
00952 
00953                             QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00954                             accept() ;
00955                         } else {
00956                             QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00957                             reject();
00958                         }
00959                     }
00960                 break;
00961             }
00962         break;
00963     }
00964 
00965 
00966     Page++;
00967 
00968     updateScena();
00969 
00970     return;
00971 }
00972 
00973 void Wizard::previosWizardPage(){
00974     /*
00975         Back command function clicking
00976     */
00977 
00978     /*  switch(Scena){
00979             case 0:
00980                 switch (Page){
00981                     case 1:
00982 
00983                     break;
00984                 }
00985             break;
00986         }
00987     */
00988 
00989     Page--;
00990 
00991     updateScena();
00992 
00993     return;
00994 }
00995 
00996 void Wizard::updateScena(){
00997         lblStep->setText(Wizard::tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00998 
00999         switch(Scena){
01000             case 1:
01001                 /*
01002                 New prefix creation
01003                 */
01004                 switch (Page){
01005                     case 1:
01006                         lblCaption->setText(Wizard::tr("<b>First startup wizrd</b>"));
01007                         lblWizardInfo->setText(Wizard::tr("<p>Welcome to first startup wizard.</p><p>This wizard helps you to make all necessary steps for successful %1 setup.</p><p>Please, press the <b>Next</b> button to go to the next wizard's page. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>").arg(APP_NAME));
01008 
01009                         widgetFirstStartup0->setVisible(FALSE);
01010                         widgetInfo->setVisible(TRUE);
01011 
01012                         cmdNext->setEnabled(TRUE);
01013                         cmdBack->setEnabled(FALSE);
01014                     break;
01015                     case 2:
01016                         txtInfo->setText(tr("<p><b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>%1</span></b> was initially written by Malakhov Alexey aka John Brezerk  [<a href='mailto:brezerk@gmail.com'>brezerk@gmail.com</a>]</p><p>General ideia comes from <b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>WineTools</span></b> scripts witch was initially written by Frank Hendriksen [<a href='mailto:frank@frankscorner.org'>frank@frankscorner.org</a>]</p><p>It is licensed under the <b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>GPL v3</span></b>.</p><p>Send comments, bugreports, etc. to [<a href='mailto:brezerk@gmail.com'>brezerk@gmail.com</a>]</p><p><b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>Note</span></b>: This software comes with absolutely no warranty. You will <b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#7D1D10;'>NOT</span></b> get any support or help for WineTools, Wine, software installations, Linux or Microsoft Windows from the author.</p><p>If you <span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>need help</span>, ask the mailing lists at <a href='http://www.winehq.org/site/forums'>http://www.winehq.org/site/forums</a>.</p><p>If you <span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>want support</span>, buy the commercial versions of wine: CodeWeavers CrossOver Office (<a href='http://www.codeweavers.com'>http://www.codeweavers.com</a>) for Desktop Applications</p>").arg(APP_NAME));
01017 
01018                         widgetCreatePrefix1->setVisible(FALSE);
01019                         widgetInfo->setVisible(FALSE);
01020                         widgetFirstStartup0->setVisible(TRUE);
01021 
01022                         cmdNext->setEnabled(TRUE);
01023                         cmdBack->setEnabled(TRUE);
01024                     break;
01025                     case 3:
01026                         widgetFirstStartup0->setVisible(FALSE);
01027                         widgetFirstStartup1->setVisible(FALSE);
01028                         widgetCreatePrefix1->setVisible(TRUE);
01029                         lblInfoPrefix1->setText(tr("<p>Please enter default wine settings.</p><br>"));
01030                     break;
01031                     case 4:
01032                         widgetCreatePrefix1->setVisible(FALSE);
01033                         widgetFirstStartup2->setVisible(FALSE);
01034                         widgetFirstStartup1->setVisible(TRUE);
01035                     break;
01036                     case 5:

01200 
01201 
01202 void Wizard::getprocDevices(){
01203     /*
01204         Getting divice names at /proc/diskstats
01205     */
01206 
01207     QString name, procstat, path, prefix;;
01208 
01209     QFile file("/etc/fstab");
01210     if (!file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text)){
01211         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, i can't access to /etc/fstab"));
01212     }
01213 
01214     while (1) {
01215         QByteArray line = file.readLine();
01216 
01217         if (line.isEmpty())
01218             break;
01219 
01220         if (line.indexOf("cdrom")>=0){
01221             QList<QByteArray> array = line.split(' ').at(0).split('\t');
01222                 combSourceDevice->addItem(array.at(0));
01223         }
01224     }
01225     file.close();
01226 
01227     return;
01228 }
